channel.title: 677 / 728 item stats
channel.description: can i ask how do i go about changing an items stats it a 677 loaing 728? iv been looking and have googled about 10 times and all i could find is 317,508 crap. its always the simple things that grind me to a hoult lol.

item.title: 677 / 728 item stats
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

Go into souce>data>items>bounuses> change stats then run itempacker. Your welcome.

Read full topic
